short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to quickly close all tabs to the left of your current tab with just one click. A handy tool for efficient tab management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Close Tabs to the Left" is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience. With just a single click on the extension icon, it swiftly closes all tabs to the left of your current tab. This is particularly useful when you have numerous tabs open and want to declutter your browser quickly and efficiently. The extension requires minimal permissions, only needing access to your tabs to perform its function. It's lightweight, easy to use, and a great tool for managing your browser tabs.
